Executive Team.description: The Executive Team is responsible for overseeing the club as a whole. Their work includes organizing club activities, maintaining corporate partnerships, managing core teams, handling member relations, and defining club vision. The team currently consists of the President, Vice President of External, and Vice President of Internal.

people.name: Abhik Mazumder

Leadership.description: Team Leads are responsible for administering their core teams. Their work includes developing core team content, running meetings during hack nights, managing team members, and representing the club in general. The different teams are - ML, Android, iOS, Web, Security, Quant, Open Source, Embedded Systems, Interviewing, and Design.
